name: maize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tall plant grown in many parts of the world for its yellow seeds, which are eaten as food, made into flour, or fed to animals
Dan Thornberg/EyeEm/EyeEm/GettyImages
Examples
The villagers cultivate mostly maize and beans.In Britain, this flour usually goes under the name of maize meal.The villagers grow coffee and maize to sell in the market.
